## QueryIndices.remove() method

Remove a index from the set of Indices selected.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
remove(value: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | string | The index name to be removed. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
